Ansible Collections Documentation
Ansible collections
  • nomakcooper.collection.charts module – Generate high-quality charts using Plotly and save them as images.
  • nomakcooper.collection.exa_facts module – Gathers facts about Oracle Exadata Machine and rack.
  • nomakcooper.collection.open_excel module – Read and update Excel (.xlsx) files using openpyxl
  • nomakcooper.collection.sar_facts module – Collect system activity report (SAR) data for system performance monitoring.
Ansible collections
  • Nomakcooper.Collection

Nomakcooper.Collection

Collection version 1.2.0

  • Description

  • Plugin Index

Description

Ansible Custom Module Collection

Author:

  • Marco Noce <nce.marco@gmail.com>

Supported ansible-core versions:

  • 2.15.0 or newer

  • Issue Tracker
  • Repository (Sources)

Plugin Index

These are the plugins in the nomakcooper.collection collection:

Modules

  • charts module – Generate high-quality charts using Plotly and save them as images.

  • exa_facts module – Gathers facts about Oracle Exadata Machine and rack.

  • open_excel module – Read and update Excel (.xlsx) files using openpyxl

  • sar_facts module – Collect system activity report (SAR) data for system performance monitoring.
